name: Vox-Wing vs VOX Fighter
description:
A tiny prototype designed for some 2-player fun (and the Winnitron). This is fan art; everything belongs to Disney.

Game is in very early stages; you can fly around and shoot each other and a score is kept, but the ships are invincible and don't respawn in a new location when you die. But you can race each other to a certain score. :)

Controls:

VOX Fighter:
Arrow keys = move 
/ (slash) = fire
. (period) = random TIE scream

Vox-Wing: 
WASD = move 
1 = fire
2 = lock s-foils in attack position
